Add your own question!
Custom Question
What was it like where you grew up?
Are there any funny stories that come to mind about growing up?
Can you tell me something that happened at the last school you attended?
Did you have a nickname? If so, is there a story about how you got it?
What is one vivid memory you have from growing up?
Can you tell me the story of when you first saw me?
Can you tell me about a significant turning point in your life?
What is the first family event you can remember?
Can you tell me about your first job?
Can you tell me what you know about when our family first came to this country?
How did you meet an important romantic partner in your life?
What do you remember learning from relationships around you growing up?
Can you tell me about when you first fell in love?
How have your ideas about relationships changed over time?
Can you tell me something you have learned through your relationships?
How would you like to be remembered?
What change would you like to see in the world?
Do you have a personal motto or words that you live by?
What does being a good person mean to you?
What is the importance of family in your life?
